info.abstract:
The Text Converter component converts various types of text file to other text file types. Currently you can use this component to convert a XML, Tab-delimited, CSV or JSON file into a XML, Tab-delimited, CSV or JSON file. Additionally, it can also convert a VTT file to a CSV file.
This component currently can only convert simple XML file. Here is an example of an XML file that can be converted with this component:
<model_output>
<model_output_fold_1_run_1>
<N>27570</N>
<Loglikelihood>-14447.18758</Loglikelihood>
</model_output_fold_1_run_1>
<model_output_fold_2_run_10>
<Accuracy>0.73623</Accuracy>
<Loglikelihood>-14567.18758</Loglikelihood>
</model_output_fold_2_run_10>
</model_output>
This component currently can only convert flat JSON oject file. Here is an example of a JSON file that can be converted with this component:
[{ "model_output": {
"model_output_fold_1_run_1": {
"N": "27570",
"Loglikelihood": "-14447.18758"},
"model_output_fold_2_run_10": {
"Accuracy": "0.73623",
"Loglikelihood": "-14567.18758"}
}}]
info.description: This component allows you to convert text file from one type to another. Currently you can use this component to convert between XML, tab-delimited, CSV, and JSON. It can also convert VTT to CVS. Blank lines are removed from Tab-delimited and CSV files prior to converting to JSON.

ul.li: A text file to be converted.
Text file converted to a new format.
Input file type - Tab-Delimitied, CSV, XML, JSON, VTT
Output file type - Tab-Delimited, CSV, XML, or JSON
